data_table.description: Dental Screening Form, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: DSRA1A
variable.description: Do you have ANY of your natural teeth? Q1a [Dental Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DSRA1B
variable.description: Do you have any dental implants? Q1b [Dental Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DSRA2
variable.description: Has a dentist or a physician ever told you that you need to take antibiotics before every dental visit? Q2 [Dental Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DSRA4
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have any of the following? Congenital heart disease. Q4 [Dental Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DSRA5
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have any of the following? Rheumatic heart disease. Q5 [Dental Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DSRA6
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have any of the following? A heart murmur from a defect in the structure in the heart? Q6 [Dental Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DSRA7
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have any of the following? An infection of the lining of the heart called endocarditis? Q7 [Dental Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DSRA8
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you have any of the following? Mitral valve prolapse. Q8 [Dental Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DSRA9
variable.description: Do you have a cardiac pacemaker? Q9 [Dental Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DSRA10
variable.description: Have you had a heart, kidney, or other organ transplant? Q10 [Dental Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DSRA11
variable.description: Do you have a surgically implanted heart valve, stent, shunt or artificial joint? Q11 [Dental Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DSRA12
variable.description: Are you on kidney dialysis? Q12 [Dental Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DSRA13
variable.description: Have you had major surgery, radiation, or chemotherapy for cancer within the last 2 months? Q13 [Dental Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DSRA14
variable.description: Are you taking prednisone or an immunosuppressive medication? Q14 [Dental Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DSRA15
variable.description: The participant meets an exclusion criterion from the screening interview? Q15 [Dental Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DSRA16
variable.description: May I schedule you for the dental exam? Q16 [Dental Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: DSRAFLAG
variable.description: 1= DSRA form is present [Dental Screening Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Dental Screening Form, exam 4]
